p: All results are expressed as mean ± standard error (SE). One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was employed, followed by the posthoc Duncan test to identify significant differences ( P < 0.05) using the SPSS software 17.0. The significant difference ( P < 0.05) between the standard and the methanolic extract of the C. auriculata root in in vitro anti-diabetic assay was determined by Student’s t-test.
